title: :lang
description: The `:lang` CSS pseudo-class selects elements based on the language specified in their `lang` attribute, allowing for styling based on language codes like 'en' for English or 'fr' for French.
content: The pseudo-class that applies styles to elements based on the language of the content, as specified by the `lang` attribute. It helps in adapting styles for different languages, like adjusting font styles or text directions for better readability.
